channel.title: Whonix 16.0.4.2 - for VirtualBox - Point Release!
channel.description:
# Whonix for VirtualBox
Download Whonix for VirtualBox:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VirtualBox
----
This is a point release.
https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Point_Release
----
# Major Changes
* install [tor-ctrl](https://github.com/nyxnor/tor-ctrl) by running `sudo apt install tor-ctrl` ([in Whonix](https://github.com/Whonix/tor-ctrl)) ([discussion](https://forums.whonix.org/t/tor-ctrl-tor-control-port-command-line-tool/8074)) (edited) (will be installed by default in next Whonix point release) * `tor-ctrl` * `tor-ctrl-circuit` * `tor-ctrl-onion` * `tor-ctrl-stream` * https://forums.whonix.org/t/canning-thunderbirds-startpage/13007/1 * fix https://forums.whonix.org/t/tb-v11-06-new-identity-function-error-message/13326 * fix `onion-grater-remove` gateway command * updated [LKRG (Linux Kernel Runtime Guard)](https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Linux_Kernel_Runtime_Guard_LKRG) * updated [Hardened Malloc](https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Hardened_Malloc) * renamed Hardened Malloc Kicksecure To [Hardened Malloc Light](https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Hardened_Malloc_Light)
----
# Upgrade
Alternatively, in-place release upgrade is possible upgrade using [Whonix repository](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Project-APT-Repository).
----
This release would not have been possible without the numerous supporters of Whonix!
----
Please Donate!
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Donate
----
Please Contribute!
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Contribute
----
# Changelog
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Stable_Release#Whonix_%E2%84%A2_16.0.4.2
----
# Full difference of all changes
https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/compare/16.0.3.7-developers-only...16.0.4.2-developers-only

item.title: Whonix 16.0.4.2 - for VirtualBox - Point Release!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Whonix for VirtualBox

Download Whonix for VirtualBox:

Whonix – 2 Dec 21

Whonix ™ for Windows, macOS, Linux inside VirtualBox

Whonix ™ for VirtualBox - Stable Version

This is a point release.

Kicksecure – 21 Dec 21

Point Release

What is a Point Release?

Major Changes

  • install tor-ctrl by running sudo apt install tor-ctrl (in Whonix) (discussion) (edited) (will be installed by default in next Whonix point release)
    • tor-ctrl
    • tor-ctrl-circuit
    • tor-ctrl-onion
    • tor-ctrl-stream
  • Canning Thunderbird's startpage
  • fix Tor Browser 11.06 - New Identity function error message
  • fix onion-grater-remove gateway command
  • updated LKRG (Linux Kernel Runtime Guard)
  • updated Hardened Malloc
  • renamed Hardened Malloc Kicksecure To Hardened Malloc Light

Upgrade

Alternatively, in-place release upgrade is possible upgrade using Whonix repository.

This release would not have been possible without the numerous supporters of Whonix!

Please Donate!

Whonix – 15 Feb 22

Donating to Whonix ™

PayPal, Bitcoin (BTC), Monero (XMR), Ethereum (ETH) or Token, Credit Card, Bank Wire, Others

Please Contribute!

Whonix – 31 Jan 22

Ways to Contribute

Spread, Follow, Develop, Testing, Donate. Contribute to Freedom Software / Open Source.

Changelog

Whonix – 18 Feb 22

Stable Release

Whonix ™ Release Notes, Changelog, Whonix ™ 16 Stable Release

Full difference of all changes

https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/compare/16.0.3.7-developers-only...16.0.4.2-developers-only

Read full topic
